mapper.select: select manager_id, manager_passwd, r from (select manager_id, manager_passwd, rownum r from (select manager_id, manager_passwd from mod_manager order by manager_id) order by manager_id) where r >= #{start} and r <= #{end} order by manager_id

select manager_id,manager_passwd,r from (select manager_id,manager_passwd, rownum r from (select manager_id,manager_passwd from mod_manager where manager_id like '%'||#{searchManager}||'%' order by manager_id) order by manager_id) where r >= #{start} and r <= #{end} order by manager_id
select count(*) from mod_manager where manager_id like '%'||#{searchManager}||'%'
